Literature.Title: Plant defensin peptides have antifungal and antibacterial activity against human and plant pathogens.
Literature.Author: Sathoff AE, Velivelli S, Shah D, Samac DA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. medicaginis 7F-3(no activity data),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. medicaginis 31F-3(no activity data),Ascochyta medicaginicola STC(IC50=19.5±1.2µM),Ascochyta medicaginicola WS-2(IC50=8.5±1.0µM),Colletotrichum trifolii FG-1(no activity data),Colletotrichum trifolii WS-5(no activity data),Aphanomyces euteiches MF-1(no activity data),Aphanomyces euteiches MER4(no activity data),Fusarium solani(IC50=4.1±0.5µM),Fusarium tricinctum(no activity data),Fusarium redolens(no activity data),Fusarium incarnatum(no activity data),Xanthomonas alfalfae subsp. alfalfae F3(no activity data),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae ALF3(IC50=4.5±0.5µM),Serratia marcescens(IC50=6.0±0.7µM),Klebsiella aerogenes(IC50=2.8±0.3µM),Enterococcus casseliflavus(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(IC50=11.8±1.4µM)
